H0.text: What term referring to a unofficial ski run is a metaphor for unrestricted creative activity which departs from a plan or agenda. Freeride

H1.text: What term referring to a unofficial ski run is a metaphor for unrestricted creative activity which departs from a plan or agenda. Backcountry

H2.text: What term referring to a unofficial ski run is a metaphor for unrestricted creative activity which departs from a plan or agenda. Slackcountry

H3.text: What term referring to a unofficial ski run is a metaphor for unrestricted creative activity which departs from a plan or agenda. Off-piste
